name: Ah! That's Paradise
description:
Customize your perfect day at the beach!  Start a new beach or load up an old one and play with the parameters. Change the weather, the crowd, and even the time of day! Decide what drink you’ll be having and chill out with some happy beach tunes. And if you get tired of it all, why not just press the red button marked reset to end up in PARADISE?

Made by perebite 2019

Music by Christian Bernard

Idea from a fake game cover by John-Charles Holmes

For A Game By Its Cover Jam 2019
